snippet: Ireland took a big step toward a rugby Triple Crown when it followed its opening day Six nations victory over Scotland with a 26-3 humiliation of Wales.
lead_paragraph: Ireland took a big step toward a rugby Triple Crown when it followed its opening day Six nations victory over Scotland with a 26-3 humiliation of Wales.

headline.main: Ireland Humiliates Wales in Six Nations Rugby
headline.print_headline: Ireland Humiliates Wales in Six Nations Rugby
